790:3: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatastamabhipretamartha vivṛtyaiva na deśayatītyāha daśānuśaṃsān saṃpaśyaṃstathāgataḥ sūcanākāreṇa dharma deśayati |
790:13: bhāvagamyo'yaṃ dharma ityavagamya jātāsthasya tasmin dharme ādaramukhena śraddhādisaṃbhāraparipūraṇāt |
790:19: abhiprāyārtha tīvreṇa yogena cintayitvā labdhavataḥ prāmodyaviśeṣādhigamāt |
790:22: ata eva paṇḍitaḥ paṇḍita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
790:26: udānaṃ yadāttamanaskenodāhṛtam tadyathā yadā ime prādurbhavanti dharmā ityevamādi ||
790:27: nidānaṃ yatkiṃcideva pudgalamuddiśya bhāṣitaṃ sotpattikaśikṣā prajñaptikabhāṣitaṃ vā,
790:46: sūtrapiṭakavyavasthānaṃ vicikitsopakleśapratipakṣeṇa vineyānāmutpannānutpanna saṃśayacchedādhikāreṇa sūtrageyādi deśanāt |
790:52: punaḥ sūtrapiṭakaṃ niśritya vineyāḥ śikṣātraye vyutpadyante,
790:62: abhidharma niśritya parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaviniścayakṛtena dharmasaṃbhogena sparśavihāro bhavati,
790:63: tatra bahuprakāraṃ dharmāṇāṃ sva lakṣaṇādidharmatāyā vyutpādanāt ||
790:74: śataṃ śatasahastrāṇāṃ koṭirityevaṃ sarvāsūttarāsu saṃkhyāsvavaśyamanayoḥ daśaśatasaṃkhyayo ranyataropaniṣadbhavati |
790:75: ata ete eva samasya daśaśatānyeko dharmaskandho vyavasthāpyate |
790:76: anayā ca gaṇanayā caturaśītidharma skandhasahastrāṇyaṣṭau koṭyaḥ catvāriśacca lakṣā bhavanti ||
790:77: sa eṣa piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ kasya gocaraḥ |
790:82: ākāraḥ, yān skandhādīnartha prakārānārabhya sā deśanā,
790:85: tatra deśanākāle paravijñaptirāśrayo yo'sāvucyate parato ghoṣata iti tata uttarakālaṃ smṛtirāśrayo yathāśrutamanusmṛtyābhyasanāt |
790:86: tata uttarakālaṃ vāsanā''śrayastadanusmṛtimantareṇāpi paścādabhyāsabhāvanā balena pratibhāsanāditi |
790:92: yāvadbhāvikatayā dharmāṇāmetāvanti sarvadharmavastuni yajjñeyavyavasthānam tadyathā skandhadhātvāyatanāni |
790:94: tadyathā satyamukhena tānyeva skandhadhātvāyatanāni yathāsaṃbhavaṃ duḥkhatojñeyāni yāvanmārgataḥ |
790:97: dharmoddānādhikāreṇa vā'nityataḥ sarvasaṃskārā jñeyā yāvacchāntato nirvāṇam |
790:101: yathāvadbhāvikatāyā nirdaśe ṣoḍaśaprakārā uktāstrayaśca vimokṣākārāḥ teṣāṃ cānyonyasaṃgrahaḥ |
790:110: na hyeṣāṃ nirhetuka utpādo nāpīśvarādiviṣamahetuka iti yajjñānamidaṃ pratītyasamutpāda kauśalyam |
790:112: tadyathā sucaritasyeṣṭo vipāko duścaritasyāniṣṭa ityevamādi yajjñānamidaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyaṃ veditavyam ||
790:128: udakena kleda ityevamādikā prasiddhā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā |
790:129: yathoktaṃ cakṣuḥ samṛddhaṃ śūnyaṃ nityena yāvadātmīyena |
790:132: nāmaparyeṣaṇā nāmakāyādīnāṃ prajñapti sattvādapariniṣpannameṣāṃ svalakṣaṇa miti yā vicāraṇā |
790:133: vastuparyeṣaṇā skandhādīnāṃ tathā 'pariniṣpattiryathā nāmakāyādibhirabhilapyanta iti yā saṃtīraṇā parīkṣaṇetyarthaḥ |
790:137: tathāhi vyutpannavyavahārasyābhidhānamātraṃ śrutvā tadabhidheye saṃpratyaya utpadyate smṛtimukhena,
790:139: ityevaṃvidhe saṃbandhe prasiddhe cakṣurityevamādisvalakṣaṇaprajñaptimātraṃ tadākhyāmāsapiṇḍādivyavahārasya nimittaṃ bhavatīti yā parīkṣeyamucyate svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā |
790:140: viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā yā tathaivābhidhānābhidheya saṃbandhe nityānityotta rānuttararūpyasanidarśanānidarśanatā di viśeṣa lakṣaṇaprajñaptimātrasya vyavahāranimittatā saṃtīraṇā ||
790:143: tatra ādhāro yādṛśaṃ bāhuśrutyaṃ śamathavipaśyanayoḥ pratiṣṭhā bhavatyālaṃbanayogena tadādhāra ityucyate |
790:144: tatpunaḥ saṃbhṛta saṃbhārasya satyābhisamayamadhikṛtyodgṛhītaṃ yatsūtrādikaṃ śrutam |
790:151: kathaṃ ca punaḥ bodhisattva ekasyāṃ yaugabhūmau prayukto nopalambhaṃ spṛśati saṃbhṛtapuṇyajñāna saṃbhāro bodhisattvaḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaniryātastathāprativedhānukūlaṃ śrutaṃ yoniśomanasi kurban samādhi niṣpādayati |
790:153: niśritya dhyāyati tatta smātsamāhitā ccittādananyaditi saṃparśyaṃ stasmin pratibimbe viṣayasaṃjñāṃ vyāvartya tadākāra svasaṃjñāmātramavadhārayati |
790:154: tadā cāsau svacittamātrāvasthānādadhyātma sthitacitto bhavan sarvathā grāhyabhāvaṃ prativedayate |
790:155: tataśca grāhyābhāvādgrāhakamapi na pariniṣpannamiti tasyāpyabhāvaṃ parivedayate |
790:157: etadeva cādhikṛtyoktaṃ bhagavatā pratibimbaṃ manaḥ paśyanni ti vistaraḥ |
790:160: sā ceyaṃ yogabhūmirhetutaḥ phalataśca nirdiṣṭā veditavyā |
790:162: yaduktaṃ sthavirānandena - pañcabhirāyuṣmañchāriputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣurlaghu ca gṛhṇātī tyatra sūtre taireva pañcabhirdharmairlaghugrahaṇādīni catvāri yathāyogaṃ veditavyāni |
790:164: dharmakuśalo laghu gṛhṇāti bāhuśrutyātprāyeṇa bhinna padavyañjanatayā |
790:169: sunirukta vyañjana jña tvādātmātmeti janapadaniruktimanabhiniviśyānuvyavahārajña tvācca granthārthayoraviparotagrahaṇataḥ |
790:171: pūrvamudgahītāndharmānniśritya paścānniḥ sartavyamiti buddhā bhisaṃdhijña tvādadhigamena tatsārādānataḥ ||
790:172: dharmavihārī bhikṣurdharmavihāri bhikṣuriti bhadantocyata ityatra sūtre bhagavatā samastena śrutacintābhāvanāvihāreṇa dharmavihāro bhavati,
790:174: tatra paryāptisvādhyāya deśanābahulā vitarkaṇā bahulāścetyanena kevalaṃ śrutacintāprayuktā na bhāvanāprayuktā yogādiriñcanādato[na] dharmavihāriṇo vyavasthāpyante |
790:175: yo'pi kaścicchrutacintāmanāgamya kevalaṃ bhāvanāprayuktaḥ syātso'pi na dharmavihārī vyavasthāpyate |
790:176: tata eva tāvaddharmavihāriṇaṃ bhikṣumārabhya iha tu bhikṣurddharma paryāpnoti sūtraṃ geyamiti vistareṇoktvā paścādāha na riñcati yogamityevamādi,
790:177: yathā vijñāyeta śrutaṃ cintāṃ bhāvanāṃ cāgamya tadubhayavihāreṇa dharmavihārīti |
790:178: na riñcati yāgamityevamādinā samādhiprayogāsaṃtuṣṭibhyāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ saṃdarśitam |
790:179: samādhi prayogaḥ punadvividhaḥ saṃdarśitaḥ sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogasaṃgṛhītaśca na riñcati yogamityanena,
790:188: sarvākārayorvodhisattvābhyudaya niḥśreyasamārgayostisṛbhistisṛbhiśca saṃgrahāt ṣaḍevapāramitā na bhūyasyo nālpoyasya itīyaṃ tanmātrasaṃkhyā ||
790:221: yadbodhisattvasya bodhisattvadharmatāyāṃ vyavasthitasya bodhicittaṃ niśritya karuṇāpuraḥ - sareṇa cetasā sarvāstiparityāge kā yavāṅmanaskarma |
790:222: evaṃ ca kṛtvā dānapāramitāyāḥ lakṣaṇaṃ gotrataḥ praṇidhānata āśayato vastutaḥ svabhāvataśca nirdiṣṭaṃ veditavyam |
790:227: kāyavāṅmanaskarma svabhāva ityevaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa veditavyāḥ |
790:229: śa lakṣāntivīryapāramitāsu yathākramaṃ sarvasaṃvarasamādānānurakṣāyāṃ sarvā pakāraduḥkhamarṣaṇādhivāsanāyāṃ sarvakuśaladharmasamudānayanatāyāṃ yatkāyavāṅmanaskarmeti veditavyam |
790:231: prajñāpāramitā [yāṃ] sarvākārakāyavāṅmanaskarmavibhutve yaḥ sarvākāro dharmapravicaya iti vaktavyam |
790:233: punaryaddānaṃ sarvajñatāmārabhya sarvajñatāyai saṃvartate sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti sarvajñatākṛtyaṃ ca karoti taddānapārimitetyucyate |
790:234: etāni punaścatvāri padāni yathākramamārambhato vāsanātaḥ kāyato nisyandataśca veditavyāni |
790:238: tadeva yadā paripūrṇa bhavati tadā dharmakāyapariniṣpādanayogena sarvajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti |
790:241: anukramaḥ | uttarottarasaṃniśrayatāmupādāya dānapāramitayā''dhyātmikabāhyasarvavastuparityāgābhyāsātkāyajīvitanirapekṣo bodhisattvo mahāntama pi bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya śīlasamādānaṃ karoti |
790:242: śīlānurakṣī - ākruṣṭena mayā na pratyākroṣṭavyam - ityevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ kṣamo bhavati |
790:246: saṃpannadhyānaśca samāhitacitto yathābhūtajñānāllokottarāṃ prajñāṃ pratilabhata iti ||
790:281: dvādaśavidhaṃ punaḥ paramatvam - audāryaparamatvaṃ sarvalokasampattyanarthitvādutkṛ[ṣṭa] tvācca |
790:292: niṣpattiparamatvaṃ daśamyāṃ bhūmau tāthā gatyāṃ ca bodhisattvapariniṣpattyā buddhapariniṣpattyā ceti ||
790:297: punaḥ parānā tmānaṃ ca paramāmīti tārayantoti pāramitāḥ,
790:303: krodhakṣāratiraskaraṇāt kṣaticittā gati tiraskaraṇāt kṣemāviṣkaraṇācca kṣatināṃ kṣāntiḥ |
790:304: kṣaticittaṃ punaryenāpa kāriṇāṃ pratyapakāraḥ kriyate tasyāgatasyānayā vilopanaṃ tiraskaraṇaṃ veditavyam |
790:305: kṣatameṣāṃ vairaṃ vidyata iti kṣatinasteṣāmabhayaprakāśanaṃ kṣemasyāviṣkaraṇaṃ veditavyam |
790:308: vṛddhaye īhā kuśaladharmasamudāgamāya dvābhyāṃ samyakprahāṇābhyāṃ ca |
790:316: tatra parapraṇītajñānaṃ parato ghoṣānvayā yoniśomanaskārasaṃprayuktā prajñā ,
790:324: hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ vipākasaṃniśritā ya ātmabhāvasaṃpattibalena |
790:333: āśayasaṃniśritā pāramitābhāvanā ṣaḍākārā - atṛptāśayena vaipulyā śayena muditāśayenopakarāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca |
790:334: tatra bodhisattvasya dāne'tṛptāśayo yadbodhi sattvasyaikakṣaṇe gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānloka dhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇān pratipādayato gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāṃścātmabhāva nevaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ gaṅgānadī bālikāsamān kalpān pratipādayataḥ |
790:335: yathā caikasattvasyaivaṃ yāvān sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitavyaḥ |
790:336: tamanena paryāyeṇa pratipādayedatṛpta eva bodhisattvasya dānāśaya iti |
790:338: na ca bodhisattva evaṃrūpāṃ dāna paraṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātramapi hāpayati vicchinattyābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāditi |
790:339: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne vipulāśayaḥ |
790:341: na ca te sattvāstena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti |
790:342: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ |
790:343: upakaratarāṃśca bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā dānenopakaroti nātmānam,
790:345: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dāne upakarāśayaḥ |
790:346: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tathā vipulamapi dānamayaṃ puṇyamabhi saṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vā'rthī bhavati vipākena veti |
790:347: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ |
790:348: yadbodhisattvastathā vipulasyāpi dānaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
790:350: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ |
790:352: yadbodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣvātmabhāveṣu gaṅgānadī vālikāsamakalpāyuḥpramāṇeṣu sarvopakaraṇanirantaravighātī trisāhastramahāsāhastre lokadhātāvāgniparipūrṇe caturvidhamīryāpathaṃ kalpayannekaṃ śīlapāramitākṣaṇaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitākṣaṇaṃ bhāvayet,
790:353: etena paryāyeṇa yāvacchīlaskandho yāvatprajñāskandho yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
790:355: atṛpta evaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāmāśayo yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanā[yā]māśaya iti |
790:357: yadbodhisattvastāṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāparaṃparāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāparaṃparamā bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanānna bhraṃśayati na vicchinattīti |
790:358: ya evaṃrūpa āśāyo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ |
790:359: muditataraśca bodhisattvo bhavati tayā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā sattvānanugṛhṇan,
790:360: na tveva te sattvā anugṛhyamāṇā iti |
790:361: ya evaṃrūpaāśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ muditāśayaḥ |
790:362: upakaratarāṃśca sa bodhisattvastān sattvānātmanaḥ samanupaśyati yeṣāṃ tathā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanayā upakarāti nātmānam,
790:364: ya evarūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāmupakarāśayaḥ |
790:365: na ca bodhisattvastathā vipulamapi śīlapāramitāmayaṃ yāvatprajñā pāramitāmayaṃ puṇyamabhisaṃskṛtya tasya pratikāreṇa vā'rthī bhavati vipākena veti |
790:366: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitā yāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ |
790:367: tatra yadbodhisattva evaṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayasya yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayasya puṇyaskandhasya vipākaṃ sattveṣvevābhinandati nātmanaḥ,
790:369: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ||
790:374: tatra kāyavibhutvaṃ tāthāgatau dvau kāyau draṣṭavyau svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogikaśca |
790:375: tatra caryāvibhutvaṃ nairmāṇikaḥ kāyo draṣṭavyo yena sarvākārāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ sahadhārmikacaryā darśayati |
790:395: pratyekaṃ dānādīnāṃ traivighyāt tribhistribhirupastambhairyathākramaṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ |
790:396: tatra trividhaṃ dānam - abhayadānaṃ dharmadānamāmiṣadānaṃ ca |
790:397: trividhaṃ śīlam - saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca |
790:399: trividhaṃ vīryam - saṃnāhavīrya prayogavīrya sattvā rthakriyāvīrya ca |
790:400: trividhaṃ dhyānam - dṛṣṭadharmasukhāvihārāya dhyānamabhijñānirhārāya dhyānaṃ sattvārthakriyāyai ca dhyānam |
790:401: trividhā prajñā - saṃvṛtyālaṃbanā paramārthālaṃbanā sattvārthālambanā ca ||
790:404: abhayadānaṃ cittopastambhaḥ daurmanasyaviśeṣā[pa]gamāya cetasa āśvāsāya saṃhārāt |
790:408: kuśalamūlā kṣayatā sarvasattveṣu kriyārthādhikāritayā yāvatsāraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe'pi nirvāṇadhātāvaparityāgaḥ,
790:410: gaṇaparikarṣaṇaṃ karma adhigamaṃ niśritya vineyānāmasamāhitasya cittasya samādhānāya samāhitasya vā cittasya vimokṣāyāvavādānuśāsanopradānam,
790:412: bhūmipraveśo yayā deśanayā dharmādhimuktipūrvikayā saṃbhāraparipūryāpramuditāṃ bhūmi praviśati,
790:415: punaḥ prabhedaḥ sapta dānāmi - mūladānaṃ gotrāvasthasya bodhisattvasya dānapāramitā,
790:423: vinā vāhyenopakaraṇaparigraheṇa gaganagañjādisamādhibhirākāśe pāṇi saṃcārya yatheṣṭaṃ ratnādivarṣaṇāt |
790:436: tadanena viśiṣṭena cittotpādena pāramitānāṃ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ,
790:439: yatpunaḥ parānupakaraṇopasaṃhāreṇānugṛhṇātyayaṃ svārthaḥ evamavaśiṣṭābhiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ |
790:449: ityevaṃ tathatāsamyajjñānasvabhāvataḥ paramārtho dānādibhiḥ saṃgṛhīto veditavyaḥ |
790:451: vipakṣo dānādīnāṃ yathākramaṃ mātsaryadauḥśīlye krodhakauśīdye vikṣepadauḥprajñe |
790:452: api khalu yāvantaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pāramitābhiḥ saṃgṛhītāsteṣāṃ yo vipakṣo jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca sa tāsāṃ vipakṣo veditavyaḥ ||
790:458: mahābhogatā sugatigamanamavarābhedasukhasaumanasya bahulatā sattvādhipa patyamavyābādhyātma bhāvatā maheśākhyatā ca yathākramaṃ dānādīnāṃ vipākaphalaṃ veditavyam |
790:465: tatraiva yā maitracittasya paratravighā totpīḍāviheṭhasaṃvaraṇatā sā śīlapāramitā |
790:467: tatraiva yā bhūyo bhūyaścittasyotsahanatā sā vīryapāramitā |
790:468: tatraiva yā cittasyaikāgratā kuśalādbahiravisaraṇatā sā dhyānapāramitā |
790:469: ta traiva yā yathāvaddhetu phalasugṛhītatā dṛṣṭaya parāmarṣaṇatā sā prajñāpāramitā |
790:470: evaṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyamubhayadānaṃ sarvajñajñānamiti kṛtvā ||
790:473: tatra dānādīnāṃ svabhāvo yathākramaṃ visargaḥ saṃvaro marṣaṇā'bhyutsāhaścitasthitiḥ pravicayaśca |
790:475: tatra dānādīnāmupayogaḥ samādāpanā varṇavāditā sumanojñatā ca |
790:476: tatra dānādīnāṃ ropaṇā yā parasaṃtāne pratiṣṭhāpanā |
790:484: syāddānapāramitā na śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayā'saṃgṛhītā yā dānapāramitā |
790:487: yā dāna pāramitā sarva taddānamiti catuṣkoṭikam |
790:489: syāt pāramitā na dānaṃ śīlādayo mahābodhipariṇāmitāḥ |
790:490: syāddānaṃ ca pāramitā ca bodhipariṇāmitāni dānādīni |
790:491: syānna dānaṃ na pāramitā uktavinirmuktā dharmāḥ |
790:493: yo dānaṃ samācarati sarvo'sau dānapāramitānvayaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatīti ca tuṣkoṭikam |
790:499: viśeṣato vaipulye audāryagāmbhīryadeśanā tatphalasya sarvajñatvasya paramodāra gambhīratvātphalānurūpyeṇa henunirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ ||
790:500: ekatyānāṃ tadanadhimokṣe trāsaḥ bodhisattvagotravaikalyaṃ prakṛtyā hīnacittatayā gāmbhīryaudāryadeśanāṃ nādhimoktuṃ śaknuvanti |
790:501: satyapi tadgotratve mahābodhimārabhya praṇidhānādīnāṃ kuśalamūlādo nāmanavaropaṇāt,
790:503: adhimucyamānānāmapyekatyānāmaniryāṇaṃ nītārtha sūtrama[na]nviṣya svayaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarṣasthāyitayā yathārutamarthābhiniveśāta |
790:505: evamanye'pi yathārutārthābhiniveśino mahāyāne na niryāntotiveditavyaṃ nānābhiprāyabhāṣitatvāt mahāyānasyeti |
790:506: idaṃ ca saṃdhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā mahādharmādarśe dharmaparyāye - bodhisattvasya yathārutamayoniśo dharmān vicinvato 'ṣṭāviṃśatirasaddṛṣṭaya utpadyante ||
790:509: tatra nisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādikaṃ mahāyāne rutamupalabhya tadabhisaṃdhyakuśalāḥ yathārutamevāsyārthamadhimucyamānā abhāva evāyaṃ bhagavatā deśitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpāda evetyabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśante saiṣāṃ bhavati nimittadṛṣṭiḥ |
790:510: ta evamabhāvādinimittamabhiniviśamānāstronsvabhāvānavadante parikalpitaṃ svabhāvaṃ paratantraṃ pariniṣpannaṃ ca |
790:511: tatrāyaṃ parikalpitaḥ svabhāvo yadrūpamiti vā yāvannirvāṇāmiti vā'bhilāpaprajñaptimātrabhabhūto niḥśarīrārtho yadbālā rūpādilakṣaṇaṃ samāropattaḥ parikalpayanti |
790:513: tatrāyaṃ pariniṣpannaḥ svabhāvo yatsarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvaṃ tathatā |
790:515: ta evaṃ sarvathā sarvadharmānapavadamā nāstasyā apavādadṛṣṭeḥ pratiṣṭhāpa nārthaṃ kāṃcideva yuktiṃ parigṛhṇanti,
790:516: ye'pi nītārthāḥ sūtrāntā nirabhilāpadharmatādyotakāstānapi sarvān svadṛṣṭayānulomyena pariṇāmayanti |
790:517: te eva dve dṛṣṭo bhavataḥ parigrahadṛṣṭiḥ pariṇatidṛṣṭiśca |
790:518: te punarevaṃdṛṣṭayo bhavanti - ya etāmīdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭiṃ niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā samācarati sa niravadya eva bhavati nirdoṣaḥ sarvamevāsya tatkalyāṇatāṃ yāti,
790:520: te caivaṃ svadṛṣṭāvabhiniviṣṭāstad dṛṣṭiviparyayeṇa skandhādidharmavyavasthāpakaṃ śrāvakapiṭakamavajānanti,
790:521: ye ca tāmapavādadṛṣṭimanadhimuktāḥ śrāvakayā nīyāstān pradviṣanti |
790:522: te ete dve dṛṣṭī bhavato'vajñādṛṣṭiḥ prakopadṛṣṭiśca |
790:523: svadṣṭayanusāreṇa caite yathāvacchūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vyavasthāpayamānā atallakṣaṇe tallakṣaṇasaṃjñino viparītameṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyavasthāpayanti,
790:524: evaṃcittāśca bhavanti - yasyāmīdṛśyāṃ dharmatāyāmavatarantyavatārayanti vā sarve te'prameyaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavantītyevamete dṛṣṭī viparītadṛṣṭiḥ prasavadṛṣṭiśca |
790:525: yadā punaste tāṃ dṛṣṭimārabhya paraṃranuyujyante tadā na kiṃcitsvayamicchantyabhyupagantum,
790:528: te caivamabhimānino bhavanti - ya evaṃ pratipadyante [te] samyagbuddhān bhagavataḥ pūjayanti satkurvantītyeṣāṃ satkāradṛṣṭiḥ |
790:529: aviparītadharmatākuśalaiśca tatā dṛṣṭervivecyamānāḥ sūpapannayā prasiddhayā yuktayā pratyāyamānā api tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na kathaṃcit parityajanti,
790:531: etāsāṃ ca yathānirdiṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭonāṃ yadvāsanādauṣṭhulyaṃ sā mūladṛṣṭiḥ |
790:532: eta eva ca saptadaśadṛṣṭayo doṣodbhāvanāmukhenāvaśiṣṭābhiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ punarnidiśyante |
790:555: ata evānantaraṃ tatraiva sūtra uktamitīmāḥ saptadaśa samānāḥ daśa bhavanti,
790:559: niḥ svabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ yasmātsvayameṣāṃ bhāvo nāsti,
790:561: yena vā svabhāvenaite pūrvamabhūvanna tena svena bhāvena bhūyaḥ śakyamebhirbhavitumiti niḥsvabhāvāḥ |
790:563: yādṛśo vā'dṛṣṭasatyairdharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo lakṣaṇamabhilāpaprapañcavāsanāmukhena gṛhyate tena bālagrāhānurūpeṇa svabhāvena vi[ra]hitatvānniḥ svabhāvāḥ ||
790:564: api khalu sarvadharmā ucyante trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ |
790:565: tatra parikalpitasya svalakṣaṇameva nāstyataḥ svalakṣaṇaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ |
790:566: paratantrasya svayamutpattirnāsti pratyayāpekṣaṇādato nāsya svena bhāvena bhāva ityutpattiniḥ svabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ |
790:567: pariniṣpanno viśuddhyālaṃbanatvāt paratantraparikalpitalakṣaṇābhāvasvabhāvatvācca paramārthaścaiṣa niḥsvabhāvatāprabhāvitaśceti paramārthaniḥsvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvaḥ |
790:568: ityevaṃ ca kṛtvā niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā draṣṭavyāḥ,
790:570: api khalu mahāyāne tathāgatasya sarve'bhiprāyāḥ saṃkṣepeṇa catvāro bhavanti |
790:571: tadyathā samatābhiprāyo yadāha - ahameva tasmin samaye vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho'bhūvamiti,
790:573: kālāntarābhiprāyoyadāha - ye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau praṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti te tatropa patsyanta iti,
790:574: vimalacandraprabhavasya ca nāmadheyagrahaṇamātreṇa niyato bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti,
790:576: arthāntarābhiprāyo yadāha - niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā anutpannā ityevamādi,
790:578: pudgalāśayābhiprāyo yattadeva kuśalamūlaṃ kasyacitpraśaṃsanti kasyacidvigarha te'lpamātrasaṃtuṣṭasya |
790:581: kaukṛtyenāvṛtasya ye buddhabodhisattveṣvapakāramapi kariṣyanti te sarve svargopagā bhaviṣyantītyāha |
790:583: ekaṃ ca yānaṃ na dvitīyamastīti deśayati śrāvakatvāśayatyājanārtham ||
790:591: tadudāharaṇāni ca yathāyogaṃ caturabhiprāryāna rdeśāni draṣṭavyāni |
790:594: kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭā labhante bodhimuttamām || iti |
790:596: vikṣepo hi visāraśce tasaḥ viparyāse ca susthitāḥ iti nityasukhaśucyātmaviparyayeṇānityādike viparyāse ca susthitā aparihāṇitaḥ kleśena ca susaṃkliṣṭāḥ iti dīrghaduṣkara vyāyāmaśrameṇātyartha parikliṣṭāḥ ||
790:597: vaipulye dharmasamādhikuśalabodhisattvanirdeśaḥ śamathānuśaṃsaṃ vipaśyanānuśaṃsaṃ tadubhayānuśaṃsaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyaḥ |
790:599: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe prakarṣagāminyā prastrabdhyā nirantaramāśrayaspharaṇāt pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvadauṣṭhulyāśraya drāvaṇam,
790:604: tadubhayānuśaṃso dharmakāyasya jñeyāvaraṇa prahāṇāśrayaparivṛttisaṃgṛhītasya paripūraye daśamyāṃ bhūmau pariniṣpattaye vā tāthāgatyāṃ bhūmāvuttarāduttaratara niṣyandavāsanādhānayogena hetuparigraha iti ||
790:605: tadetatpañcavidhāyā bhāvanāyāḥ phalaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nirvartata iti saṃdarśitam |
790:608: kena kāraṇena tulye dharmakāyaniṣyandatve vaipulyadharmo dhūpamālyādibhiḥ pūjyo na tathā śrāvakayāna dharmaḥ |
